roleset.name: emitting a high clear noise (like a bell)

example.name: argMs
example.text: My wife has Constant ringing in her ears ::: noise , a " whooshing " as she describes .

example.name: all args
example.text: They manifested themselves on one occasion in his ringing the bell for a messenger to forcibly eject his colleague, Mr. Ballance, from tho Cabinet room.
example.arg: for a messenger to forcibly eject his colleague, Mr. Ballance, from tho Cabinet room

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT, ring-v.01. Corresponds to VNcls sound_emission-43.2.
